translation.about.me:
I'm Guilherme Santana, an aspiring developer with a passion for technology.
I thrive on exploring diverse areas of programming and learning through hands-on creation.
My focus is on building projects that are not only useful and intuitive, but also well-engineered.
Driven by curiosity and practice, I am committed to my growth as a developer.
Please feel free to explore my work and follow my journey.
